verses.name: 1 Corinthians 14:35
verses.text: And if they will learn any thing, let them ask their husbands at home: for it is a shame for women to speak in the church.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 14:36
verses.text: What? came the word of God out from you? or came it unto you only?

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 14:37
verses.text: If any man think himself to be a prophet, or spiritual, let him acknowledge that the things that I write unto you are the commandments of the Lord.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 14:38
verses.text: But if any man be ignorant, let him be ignorant.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 14:39
verses.text: Wherefore, brethren, covet to prophesy, and forbid not to speak with tongues.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 14:40
verses.text: Let all things be done decently and in order.
